description:
Craving delicious, freshly prepared meals from the best local restaurants? With ANDO, you can have a wide range of local restaurants at your doorstep in Nairobi, offering fast and fresh food delivery for all your cravings. Whether you're in the mood for a hearty breakfast, satisfying lunch, or flavorful dinner, ANDO has it all! Order food online with just a few taps and enjoy an unforgettable dining experience from the comfort of your home.

Food Delivery in Cape Town and Nairobi
ANDO brings the finest meals from your favorite local restaurants directly to you. You can experience the convenience of food delivery in Nairobi with just a few taps. Explore a wide selection of restaurants near me, offering everything from Pakistani food delivery and Indian curries to African cuisine delivery, all freshly prepared to satisfy your hunger.

Endless Variety from Top Local Restaurants
No matter what you’re craving, ANDO has you covered. If you're in the mood for authentic Indian curries or delicious Pakistani food delivery, we've got you. For those who enjoy bold flavors, our African cuisine delivery options will take your taste buds on a journey. You can explore restaurants near me offering a rich variety of dishes, including international favorites and local gems. 

Fast & Fresh Food Delivery at Your Fingertips
With ANDO, food delivery has never been easier or faster. We ensure that every meal is freshly cooked and delivered directly to your doorstep, with the highest standards of quality and taste. From your favorite restaurant delivery app, you can enjoy fast & fresh food delivery that guarantees a satisfying dining experience.

Convenient Ordering and Simple App Experience
Our food ordering app is designed to make your life easier. With a user-friendly interface, convenient ordering is just a tap away. Browse through an extensive range of menus, select multiple items, and order food now without any hassle. Whether you’re ordering breakfast, lunch, or dinner, we ensure that your meal reaches you in no time.

Rewards for Ordering More
At ANDO, we believe in rewarding our loyal customers. The more you order, the more you earn. Collect rewards points for food with each order and unlock exciting discounts, special deals, and exclusive offers. The more frequently you indulge in our wide variety of dishes, the greater your benefits. So, the next time you order food online, make sure to enjoy your well-earned rewards!

Freshly Cooked Meals Delivered Right to You
We take pride in providing freshly cooked meals that are made to order and delivered with care. Every dish is crafted to perfection, ensuring that you get a delightful dining experience every time you order. Our focus on quality food delivery guarantees that only the best meals from local restaurants are brought directly to you.

Quality Food Delivery with a Personal Touch
At ANDO, we are committed to offering the best food delivery service. Our restaurant delivery app is tailored to your preferences, allowing you to enjoy top-quality meals from the most popular restaurants in your area. With us, you can rest assured that your food is delivered fresh, fast, and exactly how you like it.

Your Favorite Dishes, Just a Tap Away
Explore a wide variety of meals and enjoy food ordering online from your favorite local restaurants. Whether you're craving Pakistani food, Indian curries, or local African dishes, we’ve got something for everyone. ANDO makes ordering your favorite food easy, quick, and rewarding.

Download ANDO Now and Start Enjoying Fresh, Delicious Meals
Don't wait any longer to experience the convenience of food delivery in Nairobi. Download ANDO today, and explore a world of culinary delights delivered straight to your door. Whether you're in the mood for a quick snack or a full meal, ANDO is the food delivery app you can trust for fast, fresh, and delicious meals, every time.
Looking for the ultimate KFC satisfaction? Look no further! We have all your favorite chicken fries right here. Download the KFC app for a fast, easy, and convenient ordering experience.

Vuba Vuba is a pan African e-commerce platform that provides a convenient solution for residents in Kigali, and other parts of the country to order meals and daily essentials for delivery to their homes or offices within 1 hour.
[:mav: 2.0.28]

Skip the queue at Drinkit, a tech coffee shop where we'll prepare your drink just the way you like it.

Change the composition of the drink, add or remove ingredients to taste. Make it stronger or decaffeinated, hotter or in your mug. Wherever you are, we will let you know when everything is ready!

Yelp has over 135 million reviews of businesses worldwide. Whether you’re looking for a new pizza place to try, a great coffee shop nearby, or need to book a haircut, Yelp is your local guide for finding the perfect place to eat, shop, drink, explore, and relax. The Yelp app is available for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch.

Yelp features:

Food Near You - Find Restaurants
• Find the newest and hottest restaurants in your area
• Make reservations, order delivery or pickup—all from your phone
• Filter restaurant search results by price, location, open now, and more

Search for Nearby Businesses, Services, & Professionals
• Discover great local businesses, from hair salons to trusted doctors and movers
• Read millions of reviews by the Yelp community
• Home need repairs? Find the best rated contractors and handymen
• Find great deals offered by local businesses, get quotes instantly, and book appointments

Beauty - Pamper Yourself 
• Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, and more
• Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations

Search Filters 
• Filter your search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, and hours of operation
• Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, or make reservations directly from the app

Other Features
• Read expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
• Write and read reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users

Find local restaurants, read expert customer reviews, and start searching for businesses near you with Yelp. 

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_CA
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

Dodo Pizza is perfect for a quick bite, a cozy family dinner, or a fun get-together with friends. It’s more than just fast food — we create our own recipes, work with trusted suppliers, and maintain quality at every step. So your food is always delicious, and delivery — fast.
CHOOSE AND ENJOY
– Hot pizzas on crispy crust with our signature sauce
– Tasty snacks — from light to hearty
– Delicious desserts for those with a sweet tooth
– Milkshakes and refreshing drinks
– Aromatic coffee for an energy boost
– Hearty breakfasts to start the day right
– Value combos to save


BUILD YOUR OWN PIZZA
– Try two flavors in one pizza
– Add or remove toppings
– Choose crust thickness


JOIN OUR LOYALTY PROGRAM
– Earn dodocoins — our in-app currency — and spend them on products
– Get personalized offers and discounts, including birthday deals


ORDER YOUR WAY
– Fast delivery to your door
– Takeaway when you’re nearby
– Table ordering in-store

TRACK YOUR ORDER
– Watch your pizza being prepared via live camera in the kitchen
– Track your courier on the map in real time

HAVE FUN WHILE YOU WAIT
– Stack pizza boxes in a fun mini-game
– Create your own stickerboard for in-store display


TRAVEL WITH US
Dodo has over 1300 restaurants in 20+ countries — and just one app. No need to reinstall anything when you’re abroad. Menu, delivery, offers, and service — everything works as usual.
Download the app now and order food in just a few taps. We do our best to keep it tasty, fast, and reliable. 
Got questions or suggestions? Reach out at mobile@dodopizza.com

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

Магнит: акции и доставка — это приложение, в котором мы собрали всё самое полезное:

БОНУСЫ С КАРТОЙ МАГНИТ ПЛЮС
1 бонус = 1 ₽. Получайте до 2% кешбэка за покупки в магазинах и заказы с доставкой и самовывозом. Оплачивайте бонусами до 50% чека на кассе или в приложении.

БЕСПЛАТНАЯ ДОСТАВКА
Продукты, косметика и товары для дома. Привезём куда удобно — бесплатно. Скидка 25% на первый заказ от 1000 ₽ с доставкой или самовывозом по промокоду MAGNIT. Действует в Экспрессе, Гипере и Косметик.

МАГНИТ МАРКЕТ
Миллионы товаров с доставкой за 1 день. Забирайте из удобного магазина Магнит. Работает в 122 городах.

ПЕРСОНАЛЬНЫЕ СКИДКИ ДО 30%
Акции и предложения на основе истории ваших покупок. А ещё 3 любимые категории в месяц — получайте от 10% кешбэка бонусами за эти товары в магазинах.

АКЦИИ И ПРОМОКОДЫ
Покупайте с выгодой в магазинах и оформляйте заказ с доставкой или самовывозом.

ВСЕ МАГАЗИНЫ В ОДНОМ ПРИЛОЖЕНИИ
Актуальный ассортимент, цены и наличие товаров в Магнит, Семейном, Косметик и других магазинах сети.

ИГРЫ С ПРИЗАМИ
Играйте и получайте купоны, сувениры, скидки на доставку и предложения от партнёров, технику и другие призы.

МАГНИТ АПТЕКА
Заказывайте самовывозом лекарства, товары для здоровья и красоты. Привезём в одну из тысячи Магнит Аптек по всей России.

ЧТО ЕЩЁ ЕСТЬ В ПРИЛОЖЕНИИ
— сканер цен
— рейтинг товаров и отзывы
— журнал с рецептами и статьями
— Магнитики для выгодных покупок товаров из коллекций
— электронные чеки и история покупок
— подписка на повышенные бонусы
— чат с поддержкой

Если с заказом что-то не так, оставьте в отзыве номер. Так мы быстрее поможем.

Свяжитесь с нами, если возникнут вопросы:
— в чате в приложении
— в Telegram: @magnit_official_bot
— по телефону +7 (800) 200-90-02, бесплатно и круглосуточно
— по почте pl@magnit.ru

Whether you’re chasing dreams, running meetings, or taking a break — Zomato is built for the ones who don’t slow down. Craving biryani between brainstorms? A cheesy burger after a long day? Or just a salad and chai to keep things steady? With lightning-fast delivery from over 3 lakh restaurants, your fuel is never far. Order in seconds, track every bite, and keep going. Hustle harder – we’ve got the food.

▪ Search and Discover Top Restaurants and Dishes
From butter chicken to sushi, dal makhani to dimsums – and legends like Domino’s, Pizza Hut, McDonald’s, Starbucks, and more – Zomato puts your cravings on speed dial. Just decisions, made easy.

▪ Access Restaurant Details
 Menus, ratings, reviews, photos – everything you need to decide fast and eat faster. Rate your meal to guide the next hungry hustler.

▪ Try Veg Mode
Veg Mode curates top vegetarian dishes, veg-only restaurants, and even veg-only delivery fleets. Clean eating with no compromise.

▪ Schedule Your Orders
 Time is currency. Lock in your lunch or dinner before the hunger hits. The scheduling feature lets you plan ahead and stay on track.

▪ Food on Train
 Even when you’re on the move, Zomato keeps up. Enter your PNR, pick your dish, and get your meal delivered to your seat at 130+ stations. No chaos, no compromises –  just food (and your schedule) right on track.

Blinkit is India’s last minute app. Trusted by millions, it is your everyday online grocery shopping app that home-delivers 10,000+ daily groceries in just a blink. Buy milk products, fresh fruits & vegetables, daily grocery, kitchen, home & office items by shopping for them online on Blinkit. Enjoy easy and smooth app experience with quick delivery.

- Best price and quality fresh fruits & vegetables
- Milk, curd, bread, butter, eggs, cheese, paneer & other daily grocery
- Snacks, biscuits, chips, ice cream, chocolates
- Cold drinks, ice, bottle opener
- Atta, rice, dal, oil, masalas, noodles
- Personal care, detergent, cleaning supplies
- Diapers & baby care
- Pet food
- Bulbs, batteries, mobile chargers
- Emergency medicines, thermometer
- Kitchen tools like chopper, blender, grinder
- Puja needs
- Stationery
- Smart watches, LED lights, Headphones



Beauty & skincare store
Makeup, luxury beauty brands & everyday skincare – now on Blinkit! Shop a huge range of authentic makeup, bath & body, hair care products, beauty accessories & much more!

Electronics store
Wireless or bluetooth earphones? Check. Smart watches? Yes. LED lights? Absolutely! Shop affordable and latest electronics online at best prices, only on Blinkit.

Safe and quick grocery delivery app
The average driving speed for Blinkit (formerly Grofers) delivery agents is 20kmph, since we have a grocery delivery store located every 2 km to instantly serve you.

Many safe payment options
Do your grocery shopping online on Blinkit & pay safely and securely for your groceries with UPI, COD or cards / wallets / netbanking / buy now pay later. We accept Sodexo meal pass and Paytm food wallet too.

Authentic phone accessories
We don’t want you to wait for the most premium and authentic phone accessories out there – which is why you can get them in minutes on Blinkit.

Printouts delivered in minutes
With Blinkit, you can get a printout of anything delivered in just minutes. With convenient options of both black & white and coloured prints, get all your documents sorted instantly!

Low prices, amazing offers
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) offers you big discounts and savings on daily grocery, bundles and bank offers. We give the best prices on online groceries with our monthly House Full Sale!

Live order tracking & helpful customer support
Track your grocery order online, right from your payment being confirmed to the delivery of your groceries. In case you need help, simply tap & chat with our customer support executives who are always ready to assist you.

Delivering groceries in 20+ cities
Instantly do your grocery shopping online! Get delivery of milk, vegetables, bread, snacks & more on the Blinkit app in Ahmedabad, Bengaluru, Chandigarh, Chennai, Delhi, Faridabad, Gurgaon, Hyderabad, Jaipur, Jalandhar, Kanpur, Kolkata, Lucknow, Ludhiana, Meerut, Mohali, Mumbai, Panchkula, Pune, Noida, Ghaziabad, Vadodara & Zirakpur.

Huge variety of local & international brands
Blinkit (formerly Grofers) grocery delivery app has a huge variety of shopping brands available online, including local specialities. In fact, Blinkit has brands you won’t find anywhere else. You can get delivery of daily grocery, festival special products, and even gourmet and international foods! Get the latest products from leading brands like boAt, The Wishing Chair, Ekam, MasterChow, The Body Shop, Farmley, Engage, The Whole Truth, The Moms Co, SuperBottoms, Tropicana, Nestle, Coca Cola, Lay’s, Harvest, Ferrero, Toblerone, Oreo, Nutella, Starbucks, Clinique, Kama Ayurveda, L'Occitane, Innisfree, Davidoff, Rage Coffee, Lindt, Starbucks, Blue Tokai, Sleepy Owl, Wingreens Farms, Bagrry's, Gunsberg, Jade Forest, Jimmy's Cocktails, Eveready, Nivea, Garnier, Lakmé, Haldiram's, Bikano, Heinz, Vahdam, Dettol, Cadbury, ITC, Colgate Palmolive, PepsiCo, Durex, Licious, Aashirvaad, Saffola, Patanjali, Fortune, 24 Mantra, TGL Co., Nestle, Amul, Dabur, & many more.

app_name: 美团外卖-外卖订餐,送啥都快
description:
美团外卖，专业的美食外卖订餐平台！

 不出门不下厨房即可享受各地区特色美食外卖，天天都是美食节！上美团拼好饭选择极具性价比的外卖，0配送费，无起送价。无需用券就能畅吃大牌，实惠外卖十分满足！

 超多品牌外卖如必胜客，肯德基，必胜客宅急送，私房菜等多种美食送餐上门～附近美食，超市百货，生鲜，中餐、西餐、蛋糕店、美食小吃、快餐、火锅、川菜、蛋糕、烤肉、美食饮料甜点，外卖订餐更方便，不用出门直接叫外卖订餐吃饭。

 寒冷、雪天、宵夜不想出门？动动手指，即可下单，最快30分钟可享用美食。还在等什么，饿了马上下载美团外卖app，享受优质的美食外卖订餐服务。

 【新人福利】

 新用户最高可领60元大额红包

 【功能介绍】

 附近美食，全国各地特色美食 
全新支持，超市百货生鲜下单 
简单订餐，手机下单快速方便 
品质外卖，品牌餐厅安全放心 
在线支付，在线支付优惠更多

КОРЕЙСКИЙ СТРИТ-ФУД В ТВОЁМ КАРМАНЕ!

Открой для себя вкус Кореи с нашим обновлённым мобильным приложением ЧИКО! Мы собрали всё, что ты любишь в корейской культуре: наслаждайся блюдами, как в любимых дорамах и на улицах Сеула, почувствуй себя настоящим K-POP айдолом! 

Гибкая и щедрая бонусная программа! Теперь с новой программой лояльности накапливай и трать баллы не только в приложении, но и в наших ресторанах! Оплачивай баллами до 100% заказа — да, мы реально честны с нашей аудиторией! Также жди кэшбек за каждый заказ, и прокачивай свои баллы в избранных категориях!

Ещё удобнее с авторизацией по СМС! Больше никаких лишних движений: входи в приложение через СМС и получай доступ к своим бонусам, любимым блюдам и выгодным предложениям!

Акции, бонусы и 100% оплаты баллами! Скачай приложение, участвуй в акциях и копи баллы за каждый заказ. Все накопленные баллы ждут тебя, чтобы стать частью твоих следующих вкусных приключений с ЧИКО!

Publix Delivery lets you order groceries from your neighborhood Publix to be shopped and delivered by Instacart* the same day, in as little as one hour. 

 SHOP RIGHT FROM THE APP 
 Just create an Instacart account and then order from the South’s favorite supermarket via Instacart. Get fast deliveries to your door on groceries, home essentials, and more. You could also use the Publix Curbside service at select locations, and get your groceries shopped by skilled Publix associates right to your car. 
 These convenient services are available in many zip codes across the Southeast, and you can find out if delivery or curbside is available near you in the app. 

 WHY PUBLIX DELIVERY, POWERED BY INSTACART: 
 • Instacart shoppers check expiration dates and select quality produce 
• Save with weekly sales
• Get delivery from Instacart in as little as one hour 
• Order Publix Curbside, drive to a reserved spot, get your groceries to your car 
• Reorder previous items with ease 
• Contact your Instacart shopper in real time   
*Instacart is an independent business that provides online ordering, shopping and delivery services to Publix’s customers.

TRY RAPPI TODAY

Get everything delivered in minutes. Discover the app that makes life simpler.

Rappi brings you the best selection of food, groceries, liquor, convenience items, pharmacy essentials, flowers, and so much more. With over 200,000 restaurants and stores in 300+ cities across Latin America, Rappi connects you with the best products in your city.

WHAT CAN YOU ORDER?

- Your favorite meals: Pizzas, burgers, bowls, sushi, and much more.
- Rappi Turbo for ultra-fast, 10-min deliveries: Over 8,000 everyday products and meals brought to your door in minutes.
- Groceries: Fresh items from top brands, handpicked by experts and delivered to your door.
- Pharmacy: Everything you need to take care of yourself, anytime.
- Liquor and convenience: Drinks, snacks, and more for your next gathering with friends or family.
- Pet care and gifts: Treat your furry friends or find the perfect gift from thousands of options.
- RappiFavor: Need a concierge? We'll pick up, buy or deliver anything for you. Quick and reliable task-based deliveries are here to help.
- Rappi Bank & Rappi Card: Credit card with no annual fees, cashback perks, and 24/7 support.
- Rappi Travel: Plan your next trip with exclusive deals on flights and hotels.

WHAT'S NEW WITH RAPPI

- Follow your friends: See their favorites, share recommendations, and connect over what you enjoy.
- Top recommendations: Discover local foodie picks from influencers, celebrities, and foodies across 9 countries.
- Exclusive offers just for you: Enjoy personalized discounts and offers, all in one place and tailored to your interests. 
- Rappi Turbo has more: More products, more categories, and now lower prices. Plus, you can now get your entire grocery list delivered in minutes.
- More precise searches: Find exactly what you’re looking for with AI-powered search.
- 24/7 10-min delivery stores: More Turbo stores are open around the clock. Order what you need, whenever you need it.
- And so much more: Update the app to explore all the latest features!

HOW IT WORKS

Browse everything the app has to offer, choose what you need, and get it delivered to your door in minutes with real-time tracking. Want it later? Schedule your delivery for the perfect time.

WHERE WE DELIVER

Rappi is available in Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Costa Rica, Ecuador, Mexico, Peru, and Uruguay—connecting you with the best your city has to offer.

DOWNLOAD RAPPI AND REDEFINE HOW YOU EXPERIENCE YOUR CITY.

Sushi Master – Japanese and Pan-Asian cuisine delivery. This is is an international chain of delivery restaurants with locations in Ukraine, Hungary, Romania, and Dubai. We deliver the most delicious sushi, rolls, sets, and WOK!

Order delivery with just a one click or pick up your order using the self-pickup feature in the Sushi Master app.

Choose from sushi, rolls, sushi boxes, sushi combos, hot dishes, or WOK… Or simply start with the «Fresh Selections» section!

With the Sushi Master app, you can quickly and easily order sushi and rolls in just a few taps. Install the app and access these great features:

• Detailed information on ingredients and calorie count for each dish.
View the full ingredient list and calorie count for every dish you choose directly in the app.

• Your order reaches the kitchen in just 5 seconds.
The Sushi Master app is fully integrated with our internal order management IT system. As soon as you place an order, it only takes us 5 seconds to start preparing it.

• Track your order status.
We value your time, so our app allows you to track your order every step of the way – Order processed, In preparation, Out for delivery, Delivered.

• Convenient payment options.
Сash, online, card upon delivery, Apple Pay.

• Courier route tracking.
Monitor your courier's movement in real time to stay informed of where your order is at all times.

• Order history.
The Sushi Master app keeps track of all your previous orders. Forgot the name of the roll or set you loved? Just find it in your order history!

• Easily repeat your favorite orders.
With the repeat order feature, you can easily reorder rolls, sushi or sets you loved last time.

• Manage your personal account.
Easily update your email and date of birth,.

• Save multiple delivery addresses.
Order delivery to your home or office and store all your preferred addresses (home, office, you friend’s place, etc).

• Be the first to know about promotions, special offers, and new menu items.
Check out the «Fresh Selections» section, view current stories, and receive push notifications to stay updated on all the latest offers!

• Light or dark mode? Choose your favorite app theme.
Just a few clicks, and soon the most delicious Japanese sushi rolls will be at your doorstep! What are you waiting for? Download the app now and experience the best delivery service from Sushi Master!

At Sushi Master, every dish is crafted by highly skilled sushi chefs using only fresh ingredients from trusted suppliers. From premium sushi rice to original Japanese sushi, sushi boxes, salads, and beverages – everything reflects the skill and passion of our team!

Find us online in Ukraine:

Share your experience with our delivery, service, and Sushi Master app by leaving a review and rating. We are already waiting for your order. We guarantee that you will love Sushi Master sushi and rolls, so enjoy your meal!

comecome is the fastest and most convenient online application for ordering food & groceries, where there are large variety restaurants and groceries to choose from, with a wide selection of dishes and cuisines, all your favorite cafes and restaurants, food and groceries delivery to your home and office with the lowest prices in the market。

The detox diet plan app is designed to help you detoxify your body by encouraging a healthy lifestyle. With a wide range of features like a nutrition tracker and a vast library of detox recipes, the detox app is your go-to companion for a body cleanse journey. The detox diet app offers carefully curated healthy recipes and meal plans for detoxification and to accelerate your weight loss journey. 

Explore a variety of detox food recipes for cleansing your body and boosting your metabolism. We have an extensive collection of detox recipes, including detox juice recipes and detox smoothie recipes. Enjoy healthy eating with 300+ detox drinks and a weight loss tracker to track your weight. 

Detoxify your body by removing and eliminating toxins with detox drinks and juices. Our vast collection of detox water drink recipes will help you do a clean diet effectively. These detox drinks weight loss recipes include smoothie and juice recipes. Our detox meal planner for weight loss feature provides you with nutritious detox recipes. 

Lose weight and boost your overall well-being with our detox drinks recipes for weight loss app. It is important to detoxify your body to remove harmful chemicals. Staying hydrated is a vital component of any weight loss diet plan, and the detox app makes it easy. From refreshing detox water combinations to detox smoothie recipes, the detox diet plan app offers a diverse range of options to suit your taste preferences. Say goodbye to sugary beverages and hello to a healthy diet plan with the detox drinks weight loss app.

Healthy eating has never been easier. The detox food recipes app provides a meal planner for weight loss, making it simple to organize your daily menu. Our library of detox recipes and diet plans ensures that you never sacrifice taste for nutrition. These tasty detox diet plan recipes are designed to support your weight loss goals and healthy lifestyle. Discover the perfect balance of taste and nutrition with our detox diet recipes. 

Experience the benefits of a detox diet plan and proper nutrition with our detox app. Our detox diet plan involves a period of fasting, followed by a strict diet of fruit, vegetables, fruit juices, and water. The History of Eat & Drink emerged from a humble beginning to become a renowned name in the restaurant and catering industry. We started as a cafeteria, serving fresh fruit juices and sandwiches. Branding Ourselves Eat and Drink after having established restaurants in Jumeirah and Al Quoz, we were well on our way to greater heights. We then proceeded to hire chefs from renowned restaurants in Dubai and from those around the world, the increasing demand for our food spurring us to embrace a larger family of consumers. It is now our tradition to present locals and foreigners with a spread that will linger in their memories long past their first experience of our culinary prowess. We are renowned for our Chinese and Lebanese cuisine. Apart from updating our menu and introducing new items, we take pride in maintaining the highest standards of hygiene and cleanliness. Today, we are one of the leading restaurants and catering chains in the UAE, with more than 45 outlets in Dubai, Abu Dhabi Sharjah, Ajman, Ras Al Khaimah, Fujairah and Al Ain.

Make informed decisions about what you eat with:

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

With 65 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine app and marketplace empowering people everywhere to enjoy wine to the fullest. Vivino provides wine drinkers access to unbiased information about wine from a community of millions. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine 
• Instantly see a wine’s rating, reviews, price, tasting notes, and suggested food pairings 
• Get your favorite bottles delivered to your door
• Add your ratings and reviews 
• Easily keep track of wines you like and discover new recommendations 
• Save the bottles you buy in your cellar, so you always know what you have on hand 
• Buy the right wine every time! 

VIVINO PREMIUM
Level up your wine game with...
• Our full scanning suite, including rapid-fire scanning so you can compare countless bottles within seconds
• Exact “match for you” scores for every single wine
• By-the-bottle insights into whether you usually like, loathe, or have never explored a wine style, grape, region
• Wine adventures to taste and play your way through Italy, Bordeaux, and beyond

STATS AT A GLANCE 
• 65 million app downloads and climbing 
• 16 million wines and counting from 245,000+ wineries 
• Millions of unbiased ratings and reviews 
• Hundreds of thousands of wines available for purchase in 18 markets worldwide  

KEY FEATURES
• Unbiased Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Conveniently buy wine directly from the Vivino app. 
• Personalized Recommendations: Discover more wines you will love through Vivino’s wine recommendation engine that only suggests wines we know you will love based on your unique scanning, rating, and purchase behaviour, and community ratings. 
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine on the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels in seconds to instantly view ratings, region, price, and food pairings all on one page. 
• Wine List Scanner: Select the right wine every time from any restaurant’s entire wine list. 
• Taste Characteristics: Know what the wine you’re eyeing tastes like before buying it. Taste Characteristics aggregates the most commonly used words to describe wines.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your wines to determine your taste profile, discover new wines, and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

Privacy policy: https://www.vivino.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.vivino.com/terms

Please note that we are not able to reply to comments or questions left in App Store reviews. If you have any support-related inquiries or need assistance, please contact support@vivino.com

The all new KFC App is the fastest way to order KFC food online. Ordering food and getting kfc food delivery has never been so easy, and within a few steps. Save your favourite order to avoid the hassle of looking and ordering the same items you like

In KFC, we believe in real cooks, freshly-prepared kentucky fried chicken and unrelenting quality control. Our aim is to take convenience to a whole new level and want you to have your favourite chicken options sitting at home.

Get started and order in minimum steps:
1. Download the app
2. Select the preferred language based on ease.
3. Check your favourite items categorized as part of menu
4. Add items in the cart
5. Login to use saved addresses or continue as Guest
6. Select location (Astana, Almaty etc.) and delivery address
7. Proceed to checkout and make payment
8. Track your order and get it delivered at a lightning fast delivery
9. Enjoy the food delivered at your doorstep.

Why you should use KFC App:
- Full KFC Menu: Order from the range of options - KFC Mighty Zinger Box, Twister Combo, Meals, KFC buckets & more! (Can I add items from current menu)

- Re-order KFC orders with ease: You can now re-order any of your previous orders in just a couple of clicks!

- Late night delivery: Late night hunger options. Look no further and simply order food online from KFC & we’ll rush to you with delicious chicken items even at 2 AM. This is available at select locations only.

- Hassle-free payments: With multiple payment options (including Credit Cards, Debit Cards etc.) on your fingertips, it’s now easier than ever to pay for your order.

- Special Offers: Get KFC Offers, KFC Coupons & more, customized only for you so that you can order more and get rewarded at times you order.

- Social Login: Why spent time in the login process when it can be done via social mode. Use your Google or Facebook account to login with ease.

- Have any feedback or queries?
KFC’s customer care is happy to help! Call us at - 7797
